name: places/ChIJI3KmZhpbwokR4T9Ve2KllEs
formattedAddress: 139 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 139 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: The amount of love and care that Lorraine puts in cutting each curl is incredible. I’ve been going to her salon for the past 3 years and every cut has been amazing. Love her and her work!

text.text: The amount of love and care that Lorraine puts in cutting each curl is incredible. I’ve been going to her salon for the past 3 years and every cut has been amazing. Love her and her work!

originalText.text: Sadly I had an absolutely horrible experience. Ed was doing my hair color. I ended up with my roots much lighter tone than the rest of the hair. Round two - color, washing, drying - the roots are still much lighter and grey hair is popping up. Ed was not quick to see the problem. Round three - Ed puts the color in, I can smell ammonia. I am inquiring whether the color is semi/demi permanent as I required, Ed confirms. When I feel my scalp burning and develop headache, Ed admits the color was permanent the third time around. I express regret that he used permanent hair color on me without consulting or notifying. He gets mad and works my hair very roughly. When I point out that he is mad and my hair is not styled, and I don’t want to come out of the salon with messy hair, he suggests me to leave. The owner Lorraine who observed the situation in development chose to support her friend Ed rather than her customer. When I complained that Ed used on me permanent color without my consent, she said that she trusts her friend. When I responded that he might not worth the trust she acted like she was terribly insulted and let me know I am not welcome at the salon. Very strange customer service approach. I had to spend at the salon 3 times regular time, got my hair damaged and was kicked out with messy hair. Would you want to have experience like that? You decided

originalText.text: Absolutely phenomenal experience. I had the privilege of having Lorraine cut my hair. She is a humble master of her craft who teaches you how to love your hair in its natural state and see the beauty in your individual curls. I felt incredible leaving the salon and couldn’t be happier with my hair. ❤️

originalText.text: The BEST salon for curly hair!  Lorraine and Ed are MASTERS of their craft!

text.text: The BEST salon for curly hair!  Lorraine and Ed are MASTERS of their craft!

originalText.text: I had the weirdest experience ever at the salon. I was super excited to book an appointment for a curl cut with Lorraine, and after discussing about my hair cut for ~15 mins, she abruptly decided to cancel my appointment after she actually held her scissors to cut my hair!!!! All what happened was a discussion about wifi! Her business partner (I think his name is Edward) was super rude to me when I asked for the wifi password, and literally said "it's up to the salon not to you" on whether they share the wifi password with guests. He didn't like it when I was critical of the policy & his attitude. It was the weirdest & rudest experience I had at a hair salon- if not ever!! There is a fine line between authenticity & lack of professionalism, and that encounter reflected an absolute lack of professionalism. I left the salon not only without a haircut but also feeling insulted & hurt...over a wifi password for God's sake!
